parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.99

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the object position above sea level. Given position must be in [[PositionASL]] format.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[setPosASL]] pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setPosASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 0, ([[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 1) + 10, [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[select]] 2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[Magic Variables#this_2|this]] [[setPosASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[Magic Variables#this_2|this]] [[select]] 0, [[position]] [[Magic Variables#this_2|this]] [[select]] 1, 9];  <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[ X, Y, Z]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ASLToATL]], [[ATLToASL]], [[getPos]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosATL]], [[position]], [[setPos]], [[setPosASL2]], [[setPosATL]], [[getTerrainHeightASL]], [[setPosWorld]], [[setVehiclePosition]]
</value></part></template>
